parameter.name: type
parameter.label: Spectre stes XWB900
parameter.description: Spectre job designed for Stes XWB900 Pylon

parameter.name: localFolder
parameter.label: Local folder
parameter.description: Local folder where all the result files are uploaded

code.name: pythonCode
code.value:
import shutil
print("#########################") print("#######START SESSION ####") print("#########################")
url_stress_file = os.getcwd() + '/@filename@' url_session = os.getcwd() + '/@basename@.czm' save_trace = True
#execfile('/Stf_to_Isami_v6.py') execfile('/cae/aif/04310/SERIAL_PYLON/06_XWB/02_Spectres/Stf_to_Isami_v6.py')
MS=IASession() MS.ClearAll()
IA_SPEC = ''
# MATERIAU MS.LoadMaterial("@materialName@","@materialName@","@materialReference@","Referenced")
# Sequence Loading Definition SeqList=[] LCDTtmp="" isStress=1 is1D=1 InfoMsg="You" (InfoMsg,LCDTtmp) = importStf(LCDTtmp,MyUrl(url_stress_file,IA_SPEC),"SE_Stringer",InfoMsg) for LCDTtmp_j in LCDTtmp: SeqList.append(LCDTtmp_j) print 'Sequence Loading:',SeqList
MS.CreateObject('Job_Sequence1','AirbusEO_DSequenceLoading',[ ['/LoadingSequenceType','Enum_LoadingSequenceType:CLASS LOAD CASES LOADING'], ['/EO_CLASS_LOAD_CASES_LOADING/SpectrumName','S:@basename@'], ['/EO_CLASS_LOAD_CASES_LOADING/SequenceFile','Caesam_File:'], ['/EO_CLASS_LOAD_CASES_LOADING/SequenceFile/MimeType','S:spectrum/fls'], ['/EO_CLASS_LOAD_CASES_LOADING/SequenceFile/MimeTypeFilter','Caesam_StringArray:TRUE:1::"spectrum/fls"'], ['/EO_CLASS_LOAD_CASES_LOADING/SequenceFile/Url','Caesam_Url:file:/cae/aif/04310/SERIAL_PYLON/06_XWB/02_Spectres/A350XWB900CS-111PYLON-@mission@3.fls'], ['/EO_CLASS_LOAD_CASES_LOADING/OrderFile','Caesam_File:'], ['/EO_CLASS_LOAD_CASES_LOADING/OrderFile/MimeType','S:spectrum/ana'], ['/EO_CLASS_LOAD_CASES_LOADING/OrderFile/MimeTypeFilter','Caesam_StringArray:TRUE:1::"spectrum/ana"'], ['/EO_CLASS_LOAD_CASES_LOADING/OrderFile/Url','Caesam_Url:file:/cae/aif/04310/SERIAL_PYLON/06_XWB/02_Spectres/A350XWB900CS-111PYLON-@mission@3.ana'], ['/EO_CLASS_LOAD_CASES_LOADING/LoadCaseFile','Caesam_File:'], ['/EO_CLASS_LOAD_CASES_LOADING/LoadCaseFile/MimeType','S:spectrum/cvt'], ['/EO_CLASS_LOAD_CASES_LOADING/LoadCaseFile/MimeTypeFilter','Caesam_StringArray:TRUE:1::"spectrum/cvt"'], ['/EO_CLASS_LOAD_CASES_LOADING/LoadCaseFile/Url','Caesam_Url:file:/cae/aif/04310/SERIAL_PYLON/06_XWB/02_Spectres/A350XWB900CS-111PYLON-@mission@3.cvt'], ['/EO_CLASS_LOAD_CASES_LOADING/PressureMagnitude','CaesamQty_PRESSURE:100;MPa'], ['/EO_CLASS_LOAD_CASES_LOADING/PeakMultiplicativeCoefficient','CaesamQty_DIMENSIONLESS:1;none'], ['/EO_CLASS_LOAD_CASES_LOADING/RFortAdditionnal','CaesamQty_PRESSURE:0;MPa'], ['/EO_CLASS_LOAD_CASES_LOADING/DamageAngle','Enum_DamageAngle:MAXIMUM DAMAGE ANGLE'], ['/EO_CLASS_LOAD_CASES_LOADING/ResolveStressType','Enum_ClassResolveStressType:MAXIMUM PRINCIPAL STRESS'], ['/EO_CLASS_LOAD_CASES_LOADING/LoadCaseDefinition/CPType','Enum_CPType:SE_Stringer'], ['/EO_CLASS_LOAD_CASES_LOADING/LoadCaseDefinition/SEName','S:@basename@'], ['/EO_CLASS_LOAD_CASES_LOADING/LoadCaseDefinition/ExtractionParameters/Location2D','Enum_2DLocation:Z1 LEVEL'], ['/EO_CLASS_LOAD_CASES_LOADING/LoadCaseDefinition/ExtractionParameters/Location1D','Enum_1DLocation:EXTREMITY 1'], ]) MS.UpdateObject('Job_Sequence1','AirbusEO_DSequenceLoading',SeqList)
# Fatigue_Law_Parameters
MS.CreateObject('Fatigue_Law_Parameters','AirbusEO_DFatigueLawGeoIndependent',[ ['/LawType','Enum_ToggleLawType:Fatigue and Propagation Laws'], ['/DamageCalculationMethod','Enum_ToggleDamageCalculationMethodGeoIndependent:AFI USER DEFINED'], ['/UserDefinedAFI','CaesamQty_PRESSURE:100;MPa'], ['/StressLimit','CaesamEnum_YesNo:No'], ['/FatigueLaw','Enum_ToggleFatigueLaw:AFI LAW'], ['/PropagationLaw','Enum_PropagationLaw:Elber'], ['/RetardationModel','Enum_RetardationModel:Preffas'],# Default: None ['/ConsideredCompression','CaesamEnum_YesNo:Yes'], ['/PropagationOmission','CaesamEnum_YesNo:No'], ['/Orientation_init','Enum_Orientation:LT'], ['/Configuration_init','S:Configuration:AFI/@fatigueConfiguration@'], ['/ConfigurationList_init','Caesam_StringArray:4::"Referenced-@materialName@-@material_reference_AFI_LT_";"Configuration_init";"None";"Configuration:AFI/@fatigueConfiguration@"'], ['/Orientation_propa','Enum_Orientation:LT'], ['/Configuration_propa','Caesam_String:Configuration:ELBER (AF)/@propaConfiguration@'], ['/ConfigurationList_propa','Caesam_StringArray:4::"Referenced-@materialName@-@materialReference@_Elber_LT_";"Configuration_propa";"None";"Configuration:ELBER (AF)/@propaConfiguration@"'], ['/StructureMaterial','AirbusEO_TMaterial:@materialName@'], ])
# Analysis_Parameters MS.CreateObject('Analysis_Parameters1','AirbusEO_DFatigueAnalysisParametersGeoIndependent',[ ['/ResultsLevel','Enum_ToggleResultsLevel:2'],# Default: 2 ['/NumberCyclesCalculation','CaesamEnum_YesNo:No'],# Default: No ['/CycleRules','Enum_ToggleCycleRules:@ksnul@'],# Default: 1 (KSNUL=1) ['/GeneratePlotFiles','CaesamEnum_YesNo:Yes'], ['/PlotFilesSelection','Enum_PlotSelection:All'], ])
# Spectrum Analysis MS.CreateStandaloneAnalysis('spectrum_analysis',None,[ '/CsmMbr_Name S:@basename@', 'EO[SequenceLoading] AirbusEO_DSequenceLoading:Job_Sequence1', 'EO[FatigueLaw] AirbusEO_DFatigueLawGeoIndependent:Fatigue_Law_Parameters', 'EO[AnalysisParameters] AirbusEO_DFatigueAnalysisParametersGeoIndependent:Analysis_Parameters1', '/CsmMbr_MapProcessParameterSet/CsmMbr_ProcessParameterMap[CaesamStd_StepProcessParameter]/Execute BA:TRUE:4::FALSE;TRUE;TRUE;FALSE', ],'@basename@')
MS.RunAnalysisByName('@basename@')
print("####################################################") print("####### RECUPERATION A PARTIR REPERTOIRE TEMP ######") print("####################################################")
myModel = MS.GetModel() myTempRepository = myModel.GetCsmContext().Resolve(Caesam_Url("csm:documenttmp")).GetSystemPath() myInitHtml = myTempRepository +'documentczm/spectrum_analysis/@basename@/@basename@.html' myFinalHtml = '@basename@.html' shutil.copyfile(myInitHtml,myFinalHtml) #myInitSigma = myTempRepository +'documentczm/spectrum_analysis/LR_AXE_MSN5_RHS_220D_stbd/A350XWB900CS-111PYLON-@mission3R3.sigma' #myFinalSigma = '/cae/aif/04310/SERIAL_PYLON/06_XWB/01_Etude_param_LO/SIGMA/LR_AXE_MSN5_RHS_220D_stbd.sigma' #shutil.copyfile(myInitSigma,myFinalSigma)
if save_trace == True: myInitTrace1 = myTempRepository +'documentczm/spectrum_analysis/@basename@/A350XWB900CS-111PYLON-@mission@3_HIST1_MIXMISSION_N.trace' myFinalTrace1 = '@basename@_Hist1.trace' shutil.copyfile(myInitTrace1,myFinalTrace1) myInitTrace2 = myTempRepository +'documentczm/spectrum_analysis/@basename@/A350XWB900CS-111PYLON-@mission@3_HIST2_MIXMISSION_N.trace' myFinalTrace2 = '@basename@_Hist2.trace' shutil.copyfile(myInitTrace2,myFinalTrace2) MS.Save(url_session)
